postReview.title: Manchester City 2-0 Leicester City: Grealish ends long wait in routine win
postReview.description: Goals from Jack Grealish and Omar Marmoush ensured Manchester City moved, at least temporarily, into the top four of the Premier League.

preReview.title: Preview: Manchester City face Van Nistelrooy’s out-of-form Foxes

QAData.question: Who won between Manchester City and Leicester City on Wed, 02 Apr 2025 18:45:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Manchester City won 2–0 over Leicester City on Wed, 02 Apr 2025 18:45:00 GMT.
